title: 820-3332 crashing
message:
This arrived with a damaged screen and frame from being dropped. After replacing the screen customer reported random crashing started to occur. Re soldered U8900 as usual but no change. Replaced U8900 next which lasted a couple days but same problem returned.

Is there anything else worth checking or sound like a broken trace inside the board??

title: 820-3332 crashing
message: Very likely broken traces, or solders under BGA chips...
